title: Interactive Exercise: Student Grade Manager
description:
Create a student grade management system that:
1. Writes student records to "grades.csv" (Name, Subject, Grade, Score)
2. Reads and displays all records
3. Calculates average score per student
4. Finds all students with grade 'A'

Use DictWriter and DictReader for easier column access.

**Your task:**
Implement the functions below.
